tender.description:
Contract Title: Leasehold Building Insurance Policy
Contract Reference: R4799
The London Borough of Tower Hamlets (LBTH) is seeking expressions of interest from interested organisations for the above services and / or goods.
Description:
The provision of Leasehold Building insurance for leaseholders as required by the lease agreement between the Leaseholder and the Council.
This contract is to cover the Leasehold buildings insurance that the Council has to pay as is required in the lease agreement between the Leaseholder and the Council. The value of the portfolio to be insured is between 1.5b- 2.6b.
The anticipated contract start date is: Wednesday, 01 April 2015
For a period of: 3 years (2 + 1)
Organisations wishing 
to express their 
interest are requested to register 
on the London Tenders Portal (
www.londontenders.org) where the tender documentation will be 
available for download. You may be required to complete a Pre-Qualification 
Questionnaire (PQQ). 
Organisations must ensure that access to the system is available to their representatives dealing with the contract. The council will not be liable for the lack of delegated access within the organisation and will not send any documentation regarding the contract, which shall be exclusively available through the portal.
Tenderers are responsible for allowing sufficient time to submit their ITT/PQQ. The Council accepts no liability whatsoever for ITT/PQQs that are not submitted due tointernet connectivity issues, transmission delays or errors. 
Deadline for expression of interest and return of tender is:
Monday 5January 2015by12 Midday
LBTH is an Equal Opportunities Employer and a supporter of Ethical Governance, our protocol can be found here along with Or via:
http://www.towerhamlets.gov.uk/ 
LBTH does not undertake to invite all applicants or bind itself to accept the lowest or any Tender. LBTH will not be liable for any costs incurred in tendering for this contract.
If you require any further information please contact:
Dawn Bonner
at: procurement@towerhamlets.gov.uk
tender.title: R4799 Leaseholders Building Insurance Policy
tender.submissionMethodDetails: Please apply directly to the buyer using the contact details provided.
